SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.tui

Interface TuiScene

All Known Implementing Classes:
TuiGameScene, TuiZoomedScene, TuiZoomedShelfiePrinter
public interface TuiScene
Represents a scene to be rendered by a TuiRenderer

A scene represents an entire game screen, excluding the prompt. So a single scene can render the same content, but have different prompts to allow the user to make different actions

See Also:
  • TuiRenderer.setScene(TuiScene)

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default void
    close()
    Hook invoked by TuiRenderer when a scene is replaced by another one

    Renders the current scene to the given output stream
